achievements

  • Supported 24/7 global operations, contributing to 25+ international on-premises deployments
  • Migrated critical workloads from Microsoft Azure VMs to Amazon EC2 with minimal downtime
  • Drove cloud cost optimisation across Azure and AWS, achieving significant infrastructure savings
  • Created SOPs and disaster recovery runbooks, strengthening operational resilience
  • Rewrote and standardised Redshift runbooks, reducing onboarding and resolution time
  • Deployed and managed 130+ edge modules via Azure IoT Hub, improving remote infrastructure reliability
